job_description: Consultant , Sales Process Transformation Innovative projects that deliver cutting-edge results do not run themselves. Project and Program Management within Sales Policy & Process Transformation ensures projects, programs, & strategies run seamlessly, from start to finish. Our team manages projects or leads others managing projects & strategies — ensuring cross-functional teams work collaboratively and effectively. Join us as a Project Program Management Consultant on our Sales Policy & Process Transformation team in Penang to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As a Sales Process Transformation Consultant, you will support a global sales organization and drives digital process transformation with a focus on process optimization, automation, and digitization. Your main mission will be to simplify, standardize, and automate sales processes globally with a focus on improving sales productivity and seller experience. This role will work cross-functionally to provide process engineering support for various projects and requires a combination of strategy, analysis, project management, excellent executive-level communication, and command skills. You will: Execute all aspects of process improvement projects including process analysis, scope definition, problem definition, current state and future state process designs, change execution, etc. Drive multi-year, multi-workstream, global transformations that improve the sales teams experience and improves productivity. Serve as internal consultant to identify and execute process improvement projects through workshop facilitation, interviews, process mapping, etc Use appropriate tools and techniques to track progress on various projects, proactively identify risks and/or areas of opportunity, and clearly communicate any changes to the scope and/or schedule. Report to leadership on project milestones, progress, and create executive presentations and status reports. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Prefer 12+ years of sales environment. Bachelor’s degree; or equivalent combination of education and work experience. Leads process improvement projects cross-functionally and across regions. Translate business needs into process, people, and technology solutions. Process redesign /process engineering experience Desirable Requirements Prefer Six Sigma certification. Project management certification professional with vast knowledge of Sales Tools & Processes. Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
